articles.title: Study reveals Covid-19 exposure probable outside home quarantine - Deccan Herald
articles.description: A new study has detected tiny airborne particles containing RNA from the SARS-CoV-2 that cause Covid-19, both inside and outside of the rooms in which infected people were self-isolating at home. The research was published in the 'Annals of the American Thora…
